title: #324: Sacrificial Wolves with The Propaganda Reports' Monica Perez and Brad Binkley
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This week we welcome back the Propaganda Report's Monica Perez and Brad Binkley to discuss how the political machine manufactures Manchurian candidates to deceive the masses and destroys anyone who doesn't play ball. Thank you so much for your support.

Check out the Propaganda Reports website:
https://www.thepropreport.com

The Propaganda Report Podcast:
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-propaganda-report/id1156744457

Monica and Brad's twitter:
Monica Perez: https://twitter.com/MonicaPerezShow

Brad Binkely: https://twitter.com/freedomactradio
